name: Drifters: Prophecy & Destiny
description:
Drifters: Prophecy & Destiny is a singleplayer story charting the tale of a band of pirates who washed up on the mysterious shores of Avalon. In this epic adventure, players take control of Eric, a first mate aboard the Ecuador, a vessel belonging to the Burning Sun Pirates. This tech demo will take players on an astonishing adventure, battling deadly creatures and scurrilous bosses.

Game Type:
-> Fantasy
-> 3rd Person
-> Action Oriented Role Playing Game

Game Features
These are the list of features with in demo.

-> Fast pace action combat. Players will engage in a fast paced battles with enemies and bosses where speed, dodging and strategy counts.

-> Different class fighting styles. Players will have to learn and perfect his or her fighting style with the selected Character Class. Game has 2 basic fighting systems Range and Close-Combat.
